participant_1.background:
I drive a Tesla Model X because it is a great car for commuting to school and taking my pets on road trips.
I love reading and writing about animals, so my favorite websites are those that feature stories about pets and animal rescue.
I sometimes neglect my own needs in order to be there for my kids.
i like to be alone.
my favorite sport is basketball.

participant_2.background:
I'm a free spirit who enjoys the simple things in life, like wearing flip flops.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
Baseball helps me to relax and temporarily forget about my anxiety.
i just got my rejection letter from the gifted program.
I have a secret tattoo that my dad would hate.

content.text: I just found out I didn't get into the gifted program.
Aw, man. I'm sorry to hear that. I know how much you wanted to get in there.
Thanks. It's not the end of the world, but it's still a bummer.
Yeah, I get it. But at least you still have your other friends. And you can always join a club or something.
Yeah, I guess. I just feel like I'm not good enough.
Hey, don't say that. You're plenty good enough. You just didn't get into the gifted program. That doesn't mean you're not smart or anything.
Thanks. I needed to hear that.
No problem. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and spend time with my pets.
Oh, me too! I love to read and write. And I have a dog and a cat.
Awesome! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. What about you?
I have a pug and a cat
